plot outline: Jaisingh a photographer believes his wife Asha is cheating on him.On the other hand Asha his confident that Jaisingh his cheating on her and secretly installs CCTV in his studio,and also keeps her brother Mithun as assistant of Jaisingh.Dhanu has fallen with a television soap queen Shravni.Asha suspects Jaisingh dating Sharvni and Jaising suspects Asha dating Dhanu and suspicious chain continues.
title: Sanshay Kallol
plot: Adventures of husbands who have suspicious wives have made for numerous comedies in Indian cinema and there's little to be done differently in _Sanshay Kallol_ (qv).

Jaisingh a photographer believes his wife Asha is cheating on him.On the other hand Asha his confident that Jaisingh his cheating on her and secretly installs CCTV in his studio,and also keeps her brother Mithun as assistant of Jaisingh.Dhanu has fallen with a television soap queen Shravni.Asha suspects Jaisingh dating Sharvni and Jaising suspects Asha dating Dhanu and suspicious chain continues.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
